basic.name: Name of the Chrome Extension
basic.script: Vue UI(devtools,newtab,options,popup) use Javascript or Typescript

chrome.icons: Icons use for icons, browser_action, page_action in manifest.json
chrome.background: Background page for background, hot reload, badge, context-menu
chrome.content: Add content scripts for injected js
chrome.permissions: Permissions options(contextMenus, tabs, notifications, webRequest, webRequestBlocking, storage etc.)
chrome.url: Homepage url for author eg. ad url
chrome.overrides: Chrome url overrides support newtab for Chrome Browser
chrome.lang: Choose the locale you want to load

background.reload: Hot reload modifications for nonproduction version
